Name: Call Me Old-Fashioned
Ingredients: 7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
STRAIN into ice-filled glass (preferably over a large cube or chunk of block ice).
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: An Old-Fashioned made with cognac instead of whiskey. Works well.
History: A Cognac Old-Fashioned cocktail created in 2001 by yours truly, London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Call Me Old-Fashioned contains 161 calories
